amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: \ SEC. __. None of the funds made available in this Act may be used to implement any sanction imposed by the United States on private commercial sales of agricultural commodities (as defined in section 402 of the Agricultural Trade Development and Assistance Act of 1954) or medicine or medical supplies (within the meaning of section 1705(c) of the Cuban Democracy Act of 1992) to Cuba (other than a sanction imposed pursuant to agreement with one or more other countries).
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 12 printed in the Congressional Record to insert the follwing new section at the end of the bill before the short title: None of the funds made available in this Act may be used to implement any sanction imposed by the United States on private commercial sales of agricultural commodities (as defined in section 402 of the Agricultural Trade Development and Assistance Act of 1954) or medicine or medical supplies (within the meaning of section 1705(c) of the Cuban Democracy Act of 1992) to Cuba (other than a sanction imposed pursuant to agreement with one or more other countries).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Waters amendment (A020) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A020) offered by Ms. Waters.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Waters amendment (A020) Agreed to by voice vote.
